issue.title: Catkin-ize ros packages in drcsim and dependencies (atlas_msgs, osrf_msgs, etc.)

content.raw: There's a [pending pull request for osrf-common](#!/osrf/osrf-common/pull-request/4/catkinize/diff), but we're still figuring out how we want to structure everything. osrf-common is by far the easiest; we'll then do sandia-hand, and then drcsim. I would guess it will take at least a couple weeks.
content.html: There's a pending pull request for osrf-common, but we're still figuring out how we want to structure everything. osrf-common is by far the easiest; we'll then do sandia-hand, and then drcsim. I would guess it will take at least a couple weeks.
